alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Lawrence; Washington (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 09 at 10:48AM EST until March 12 at 4:16PM EST by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Indiana... Driftwood River near Edinburgh. East Fork White River from Columbus to Bedford. .Minor flooding will continue or develop along portions of the Driftwood, East Fork White, White, and Wabash Rivers for the next several days. Flooding is occurring due to significant rainfall which occurred last weekend. Minor flooding primarily impacts local river roads, parks, and agricultural land. The high water situation is likely to begin to improve along northern reaches of the main stem rivers within the next few days, while flooding will last longer further south. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL SATURDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...East Fork White River at Seymour. * WHEN...Until Saturday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 17.0 feet, Flooding becomes more extensive. Although this level is fairly frequent, many local and state roads flood. Seymour gravel pit begins to flood. Livestock and equipment must be relocated to higher ground. High water surrounds river residences near Rockford. CR 760 E south of river gaging station is impassable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:45 AM EST Wednesday the stage was 16.8 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:45 AM EST Wednesday was 17.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage early Saturday morning and continue falling to 7.8 feet Monday morning. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. The next statement should be issued this evening by around 1100 PM EST.
